General.Name: IFirma SA
General.Description: IFirma SA engages in the provision of Internet services. The company operates a website, ifirma.pl, which enables users to manage business online. Its portal offers a range of business support services, such as online accounting, tool for invoices, warehouse management, and financial analysis, as well as customer relationship management and others. The company was formerly known as Power Media S.A. and changed its name to Ifirma SA in June 2017. Ifirma SA was founded in 1997 is based in Wroclaw, Poland.
